import React from 'react' const About = () => { return (

About us

Are you bored of the same drinkss? The Drinks Paradise is here to help you! Sometimes all you need is a good drink and some music.

You don't drink alcohol? No problem at all, we also have delicious non-alcoholic drink options. If you like our website, please share it with your friends!

Feel free to explore our Drinks, we will give you all the details you need to prepare the best drink you ever had! Cheers!

) } export default About
